description.narrative:
ForumCiv har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 3 820 388 SEK för EU-projektet "Build bridges, not walls: Reinvigorating Civil Society in Belarus" för perioden 2020-2023.
Insatsen syftar till att:
1. "Empower local leaders and informal civic groups representing most marginalised groups (youth, women, people with disability etc.), activate grass—root civic groups and their connections with their constituency".
2. "Facilitate engagement of these groups with civil society experts based in Minsk which will bring collaboration between different layers of civil society to design and advocate for specific policy issues and praxis changes among duty—bearers".
Forum Syd kommer att arbeta i samverkan med tre organisationer: Levania, Her Rights, och Youth Labour rights. Forum Syd är huvudsökande organisation och har det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer EuropeAid/162112/DD/ACT/BY. Insatsen har en total budget på 1 296 917 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 13 920 445 SEK. Av detta har Forum Syd beviljats 947 900 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 3 820 388 SEK (cirka 27%) från Sida.

ForumCiv has applied to Sida for funding of 3 820 388 SEK to carry out the "Build bridges, not walls: Reinvigorating Civil Society in Belarus" during the period 2020-2023.
The project aims to:
1. "Empower local leaders and informal civic groups representing most marginalised groups (youth, women, people with disability etc.), activate grass—root civic groups and their connections with their constituency".
2. "Facilitate engagement of these groups with civil society experts based in Minsk which will bring collaboration between different layers of civil society to design and advocate for specific policy issues and praxis changes among duty—bearers".
Forum Syd will collaborate with three civil society organizations: Levania, Her Rights, and Youth Labour rights. Forum Syd is lead applicant to Sida and has the overall responsibility for the coordination and implementation of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number: EuropeAid/162112/DD/ACT/BY. The contribution's total budget is 1 296 917 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 13 920 445 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 3 820 388 SEK, which corresponds to 27% of the total budget.

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
